Intro_Car_Driving: ^You have been driving for as long as you can remember.
^You need his help to save your child.

s0: ^You finally arrive at the scientist estate.

c-0:
^You won't turn back.

^Not now.

^Not so close from your goal.

c-1: ^You continue until you reach the house.

Intro_Portail: ^The road is blocked by a big iron gate.
^It is too high to climb over.

c-1: ^It is locked by an old rusty chain.
^Maybe you can force it open with some kind of tool.
c-2: ^It required some effort but the chain finally breaks.
^The gate is now open, you advance past it.
c-3: ^Among the abandonned tools lies a big iron bar.
^This may be useful to break the door open.
c-4: ^Not a very elegant tool but you need to get in there.

s0: ^You knock repeatedly to the door but no one answers.

c-0: ^Maybe you can find another way in.

Exterior_Right: ^The way to the back of the house is blocked from here.

b: ^You've seen something moving on the first floor.

c-1: ^You can distinguish a ghostly figure through the first floor window.
^You call out to it but it suddenly fades away.
c-3:
^There are buildings blocking the way.

^There is no way around the house from here.

b: ^This leads to the back of the house.

Exterior_Left: ^There is a small shed on the left.

c-2: ^The way opens to the backyard of the house.
^There is a ladder among the wares.
^It could be useful to enter the house.
c-3: ^Hopefully you won't have to carry it around for too long.

c-1: ^The shutters are open and the window is broken.
^If you had a way to rise up there, you could sneak inside.
c-2: ^You put the ladder against the wall.
^It is enough to reach the window.
c-3: ^You climb the ladder and enter the house.

Hall_TopDown: ^As you enter, you see someone rushing through the door just below you.

s0: ^You really hope it don't know how to open doors.
^The person has disappeared through the door.

b: ^The house hall spreads in front of you.

c-0: ^The door is locked from the other side.
c-2: ^The creature is surely still lurking behind. There is no way you are going back there.

s0: ^You open the door and penetrate the room.

c-4: ^The door seems electronically locked. There is a small device besides it.
c-6: ^You may find some leads on the first floor.

Hall_Scanner: ^This kind of technology feels out of place here.

b:
^The eye is not enough to operate the device.

^You also need a fingerprint.

^Seems like some sort of biometric device.

^Apparently it needs to scan your eye and your finger.

c-2: ^Pressing the severed body parts onto the device seems to be putting the house in motion.
^You can hear sound of the lock opening.

c-1:
^The door is locked from the other side.

^You knock to the door but no one answers.
c-3:
^The creature came from here.

^You would rather not know what is inside.
c-4: ^There is no way you are going back there.

s0: ^The silverware has been set and the dinner is ready to be served, but why all this decorum?
^You take a closer look at the frames on the buffet.

Dinner_Buffet: ^A few family photos are on display on the buffet.

b: ^A hidden case with a tape in it.

c-1: ^The photograph seems to be torn on the corner.
c-2: ^You remove the photo from the frame.
^You uncover a hidden case with a tape in it.
c-3: ^You take the tape and inspect it.
^"To Jean-Jacques" is written on the label.
^It seems to have been used recently.

b: ^You are not going back in there.

c-1: ^There is no way I am touching this.
c-2: ^May god have mercy of your soul.
^As you take the eye, you hear a loud tumbling noise coming from the bedroom behind.

b: ^You are not going back in there.

c-0: ^Ho lord, I think it is still moving.
^Something seems to be coming out of it.
c-1: ^You step closer to the creature, trying to control your nausea.
c-2:
^It is growing and moving in my direction.

^I need to get out of here.
c-3:
^It came out of there.

^Going this way is out of question.

b: ^You rush to the bathroom, hoping it won't follow you there.

Eye_Blob_Key: ^A key emerges from the pool of black blood.

c-0: ^It is disgusting but you put the key in your bag
^You hear a very loud noise. The thing is waking up.

Eye_Attic: ^You lock the door behind you, hoping that it will keep the hideous thing away.

c-3: ^You drop yourself down to the room below.

b: ^The smell makes your guts inside out.
^He is dead. What kind of monster could have done that?
^The poor kid. You have to do something about it.

c-1: ^You slowly approach your hand and pull the curtain open.
c-2: ^You try to help the poor child, but you arrived too late.
^Who could have done that. Are there any clues on the body ?

b: ^The tape player is playing a song.
^Your attention is caught by a toy tape player.

c-2: ^You insert the tape in the player and press play.

Finger_Bottom: ^The small lounge continues up to a small staircase.

c-0: ^The lock is accessible from this side.
c-2:
^You came from here.

^Let's hope the thing won't follow you.

Finger_Stairs_Up: ^The stairs climb up to the first floor.
Finger_Stairs_Down: ^The stairs leads back to the lounge.

s0: ^You slowly push the door and enter the room.
^The corridor turns and opens up into a larger room.

Finger_Bedroom_Far: ^It looks like a bedroom but all furnitures are gone.

c-1:
^Lots of books complicated books about medecine, anatomy, history and so on.

^The people living here must be quite educated.

c-2: ^The door seems loosely locked from the other side. You can distinguish the silouhette of the lock between the two doors.
^Maybe you could unlock it with a thin object.
c-3: ^You insert the card between the two doors.
^After some fiddling, you finally manage to lift the lock and open the door.
^A horrid stench coming from the room assault you.
c-4: ^The smell is unbearable but you have to press on.

c-1: ^There is something lying in the tub.
c-2: ^You gather your mental strength and look at the tub.

Finger_Tub: ^Someone is lying inside the tub, lifeless.

c-1:
^Why did she do that?

^What is happening here?
c-2: ^What are you going to do with those scissors?
^You can't believe that you are thinking about this.

Finger_Hand: ^The hand of the dead person is hanging from the side of the tub.
^Its skin is dark and reminds you of the creature.

c-1: ^If this hand belongs to the owner, it may work on the electronic lock.
^If only you had some way to take it with you.
c-2: ^The horror of the situations is numbing.
^The blade cuts through the flesh easily.
^This is not the consistance of human flesh.

Finger_Tub_Chase: ^The poor victim suddenly disappears inside the tub.

c-2: ^A dark mass starts to grow and a tentacle emerges from the tub.
c-3: ^What is that thing? You need to get out of here fast.

Blob_03: ^Another tentacle burst out of the dark mass and swings at you. You dodged this one but may not be so lucky next time.

c-1: ^This keeps coming out, how is this possible ?

c-0: ^You face back and start to run.
^There is no way you are going back there.
c-1: ^Out of breath, you rush down the stairs.

Finger_Stairs_Down_Chase: ^As you begin your descent, a tentacle grabs your feet.
^You lose balance and fall down the stairs.

c-1: ^You get back on your feet and run to the lounge.
^Please, make that the other one won't pop out.
c-2: ^You boom inside the hall and shut the door behind you.
